about_the_game:
Get penguins home safely in Gentoo Rescue! Penguins must coordinate with walruses, who just want to escape into the water. Items let you break the rules in progressively more extreme ways. They come with drawbacks, though, so tread carefully.

Featuring

  • Penguins, walruses, and fish. They offer opposing win conditions and turn every mechanic into a double-edged sword.

  • Over 300 diverse, hand-crafted levels that are simple, but deceptively difficult.

  • An interconnected network of puzzles with item-based progression and metagame twists.

  • Exponential growth of emergent interactions between items and other elements.

  • Journal for tracking mechanics, which also marks entries required for the current puzzle.

  • A tiered hint system for when you're truly stuck. These teach a deduction-based approach.

  • 16 biomes distinguishing areas and mechanics.

  • Original music.

Accessibility

  • No time-sensitive inputs, with undo and redo binds that work through resets.

  • Use controller, keyboard, or mouse with customizable binds. (Note: Puzzle editor requires a mouse.)

  • Colorblind friendly with customizable colors.

  • Most puzzles are optional for progression, and a setting makes any puzzle skippable.

  • Solutions are saved, and previously seen puzzles can be reentered from menu.

  • Many other QoL features and options.

Wishlist and join the discord!
detailed_description:
Demo 0.5.2, with Linux support!

This demo contains 21 puzzles, which showcases the basics, one item, and some teasers. It will take roughly:

  • 20-60 minutes to reach the end screen

  • 30-90 minutes to complete all puzzles

Please reach out if you have any issues, especially any accessibility or QoL concerns. Also, join the discord and say hello!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400, AMD Ryzen 5 1400, or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630, Radeon 530, or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Consistent 60 FPS on all low @ 1080p. This is GPU bounded so you might be able to get away with lower specs as long as your GPU meets these. Please reach out if you have issues!

short_description: A puzzler about sliding penguins and walruses. Pick up items to push, pull, bounce, swap, stop, steal, or explode. Uncover surprising twists hidden in a world of puzzles inside puzzles inside puzzles.
